meta.article_title: October 15, 2012 - How to Handle the First Loop Off Backspin

terminologie_extrait.contexte: spinning the ball in a reverse direction

debutant.description: Block the ball quickly off the bounce, using a slight jabbing motion at contact. This helps to neutralize the spin and gives you control.

intermediaire.description: Take the ball at the top of the bounce or even on the rise, and smash or counterloop. This allows you to take advantage of the slow, spinny loop and gain control.

avance.description: When counterlooping, make sure to loop nearly the very top of the ball. Any major lifting motion will send the ball off the end.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Multiball Drill Against Loop Off Backspin
exercices_complementaires.description: Get a box of balls and set them on a chair or other stand near the table. The first player grabs a ball and serves backspin, then loops while the second player practices blocking, smashing, or counterlooping.

metriques_progression: Increase speed and spin in loops against backspin

erreurs_a_eviter.nom: Hesitation When Attacking Loop Against Backspin
erreurs_a_eviter.description: When attacking a slow, spinny loop, do not hesitate. If you do, you will probably miss.
